page.title: 19Character of Kinross
page.content: {Is Kinross losing its character?}Since regionalisation many of the old County facilities, notably snow clearance and road sweeping have become more centralised in Perth.{Locals feel {neglected}occasionally. The new areas of housing are filling the town with a more{mobile population}with fewer local roots. A proposal to remove our name from the 'Perth&Kinross District' title has been condemned. Several requests for County signs to be erected to identify the area to tourists have yet to produce results. The most recent development is the idea of selling the County Buildings. These need much costly repair but are Listed Buildings and also contain the War Memorial in the car park at the front. Essentially the the problem is {a perceived loss of identity.
